ygData.subject: Re: Joining the Maximals
ygData.msgSnippet: Necromancer/Hell Drak/Decadel Decadel was bored, so he decided to go and have some fun by the CF.  He went beast mode and then uderground, and dug to the CF.

        Necromancer/Hell Drak/Decadel

            Decadel was bored, so he decided to go and have some fun by the
CF.  He went beast mode and then uderground, and dug to the CF.  He popped
up and saw Necromancer, Hell Drak and Firearm.  He went back underground,
and popped up right in front of Firearm.

            "Say cheese!!!!!!" Decadel said and fired his shoulder photon
cannons at Firearm, who was standing pretty close in front of him.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
           Necromancer saw Decadel fire at Firearm.  Firearm would be
blasted to the moon if he got hit!!!  Necromancer ran over and dove at
Firearm, and the shot missed them.  OH CRAAAP!!!!!!!  Hell Drak!!!!  Oh
no!!!  The shot hit Hell Drak and she went flying back, and hit a rock.  She
fainted, and fell on the ground.  Necromancer went running to Hell Drak, but
was too late.  Decadel popped up by Hell Drak, in beast mode, and wrapped
his end around Hell Drak, and then he pulled her underground, to take her
back to the Pred base.

         "So long, suckers!!!!!"

Decadel and Hell Drak were gone.  Necromancer fell down on his knees.  A
mech-tear rolled down from his optic.

            "NOOOOO!!!!!!!!  I'll never forgive myself!!!  It's all my
fault!!!!!  It's all my fault!" Necromancer said, holding his face in his
hands, crying.

        He looked over at Firearm, "We have to get her back!!!!!!!  We have
to!!!!!!!!  We just have to!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I'll kill you
Predacons!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  I sware off my spark, I sware by
the Matrix, I'll kill you all!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  You'll
all die for this!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!" He screamed in anger
like never heard before.  Moments of him and his sister flashed in his mind.
It only brought more sadness.
